name: Goombario and Kooper: Adventure to Save Halloween
name_original: Goombario and Kooper: Adventure to Save Halloween
description: WOW! This is my Mario Forever Halloween fangame. It's called Goombario and Kooper: Adventure to Save Halloween. Give Credits to Nintendo, Softendo, Buziol Games and Mariovariable3410 and JudgeSpear and Others.
